---
title: "Calendar"
---

We currently hold regular informal community meetings to discuss all things 
contributor experience and stay in touch with each other. Check the below 
calendar to see up-to-date information about meeting times.

Our meetings are currently weekly on Fridays, at 3PM UTC, on [Zoom](https://numfocus-org.zoom.us/j/81082067424?pwd=bVNqWXhqSXZEdTl6ZzFsa1lJZ08xZz09).
Everyone is welcome to attend and contribute to a conversation.

In the future, we plan to start organizing more structured events to develop 
content and showcase case studies and speakers.   

You can subscribe to our calendar with the following [link](https://calendar.google.com/calendar/ical/c_f8e3d3d0f8033c525a9d03684964245d9018cf4c2630dff21d39a6356815f7db%40group.calendar.google.com/public/basic.ics). 
Look for the option to add a calendar subscription from URL in your calendar app of choice.
